name: [MZ] Formation Control
description:
Licence: Free for personal use or comercial use.

 This script gives the developer greater control over the management of the  character group. Despite its simplicity, the functions presented here can   enhance games with a focus on the group of characters.

(1) Enable / Disable Formation Menu

(2) Sets the current leader in the group's leadership.

(3) Unfix the current leader of the group's leadership.

(4) Fix / Unfix character in your group's position.

(5) Change max number of characters in the group.
